Open Budget
Welcome to the Open Budget initiative!

At Code for Charlotte, we're a volunteer army comprised of citizens, designers, developers, technology geeks and citizen activists who use technology to help solve civic and social problems in our city. Yes! There is a way for everyone to contribute.

We've had the good fortune to work with the City of Charlotte's Finance department with the FY2016 data they've published on the City's open data portal.
